content.html: Btw, if you're watching Children of Men on BBC2 right now and wondering, "How the hell was this so prescient 20 years ago?" the answer is that the director looked at politics in the UK as it was then and took it to its logical conclusion. Welcome to Britain!
content.value:
Btw, if you're watching Children of Men on BBC2 right now and wondering, "How the hell was this so prescient 20 years ago?" the answer is that the director looked at politics in the UK as it was then and took it to its logical conclusion.

Welcome to Britain!
